summary: The module supplies PyTorch dataset classes that load, preprocess, and serve graph‑structured traffic sensor time‑series data for the METR‑LA and PEMS‑BAY benchmarks, offering separate train, validation, and test splits as well as a generic snapshot container.
business_intent: To streamline the preparation and access of real‑world traffic datasets for building and evaluating graph‑based deep learning models, reducing the engineering effort required for data handling in research and production pipelines.
